title: A Carrion Death
description: Poachers, witch doctors, diamond smuggling and corruption: welcome to the world of Botswana's Detective Kubu.They find the first body - or what the hyena left - near a waterhole considered magical by the local bush people. A string of clues suggests that the victim was murdered and his identity deliberately concealed.For Assistant Superintendent David 'Kubu' Bengu, it's obvious from the start that sinister forces are involved. As the detective follows a blood-soaked trail, marked by lies and superstition, he uncovers a chain of crimes linked to the most powerful figures in the country - people who will stop at nothing to remove everyone who stands in their way.
author: Michael Stanley
